}}{{flavour|A recurved bow, crudely crafted from troll-bone and warg hair. The cave orcs' use of archery, so unlike their surface-dwelling cousins, shows the influence of their elvish allies.}}
{{crawlquote|This weapon falls into the '[[Ranged Weapons]]' category. It is a two-handed weapon.}}

'''Orcbows''' are an upgrade over [[shortbow]]s, with more damage, but less accuracy and a higher [[attack delay|base delay]]. They can often be found on [[orc warrior]]s, as well as [[centaur (monster)|centaurs]] and [[centaur warrior]]s.
